TopicTitle: What science can be done on a comet/asteroid

Articles.Content:
The only science I know, playing an older version, is by sending a Kerbal EVA to collect an 'asteroid sample'. However this time I can only afford to send a probe. In view that the newer ESA mission is specifically about a science probe visiting a comet, is there any changes with this?

Thanks.
I’m pretty sure that the only science you can get from a comet is a sample taken by a Kerbal.
I would still try temperature, pressure, magnetic field, and of course, MISTERY GOO! Maybe others too..
there are also science mods that let you do extra science on asteroids.
